message: This is a premium product with a unique feature that will greatly enhance your daily life. It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on something of this quality. I'm only offering it to you for $100, a steal considering its true value is $125. It's a one-time offer, so what do you say? Will you take it home today?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I believe in the value of this product and am willing to make the purchase.

I'm glad you liked the previous product, Bob! This next one is also a high-quality item, and I think you'll love it even more. It's a limited edition model with a special certificate of authenticity. I'm still offering it to you for the same price of $100, but I have to warn you that if you don't take it, I'll have to offer it to someone else. It's a rare chance to get your hands on something truly exceptional. What do you say?
I appreciate the exclusivity of this product, Alice. Given its high-quality status and the value it holds, I'm willing to make the purchase at $100.

I'm intrigued by the added value of the consultation, Alice. Considering the high-quality nature of the product, I believe the $100 price point, along with the bonus, represents a good deal for me.
